Spirituall milk for Boston babes in either England. Drawn out of the breasts of both Testaments, for their soules nourishment: but may be of like use for any children. / By John Cotton, B.D. and teacher to the church of Boston in New-England. Cotton, John, 1584-1652.
[2], 13 p.
Printed for Henry Cripps ..., London, : 1657.
Imperfect: cropped, with loss of print. Reproduction of original in: Christ College (University of Oxford). Library.
